definition: to the highest degree of inferiority or badness, (superlative of `bad') most wanting in quality or value or condition, the weakest effort or poorest achievement one is capable of, defeat thoroughly
details:
adverb
- to the highest degree of inferiority or badness
= example: to the highest degree of inferiority or badness
adjective
- (superlative of `bad') most wanting in quality or value or condition
= example: (superlative of `bad') most wanting in quality or value or condition
noun
- the weakest effort or poorest achievement one is capable of
= example: the weakest effort or poorest achievement one is capable of
- the greatest damage or wickedness of which one is capable
= example: the greatest damage or wickedness of which one is capable
- the least favorable outcome
= example: the least favorable outcome
verb
- defeat thoroughly
= synonyms: whip
